intro: Corybas circinatus, commonly known as the spiral orchid, is a member of the兰科 (Orchidaceae) family. It is a terrestrial herb with a compact, cushion-like growth habit. The plant produces small, hooded flowers that are typically greenish-brown in color. It is native to New Zealand and thrives in moist, shaded environments. Its unique spiral arrangement of petals is a distinguishing botanical feature.
